description: The notification sent when a status event occurs

Summary.eval: ($v4==1) ? 'Data usage exceeded $v1 bytes for $v2 seconds' : 'Data usage is normal'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD OG-DATA-MIB::ogdataEventOccurred OG-DATA-MIB::ogdataEventBytes i 9999 OG-DATA-MIB::ogdataEventSeconds i 9999 OG-DATA-MIB::ogdataEventDevice s EXAMPLE OG-DATA-MIB::ogdataEventState i 0

description: The number of bytes exceeded during the time period
variables.name: OG-DATA-MIB::ogdataEventBytes

description: The time in seconds over which the number of bytes was exceeded
variables.name: OG-DATA-MIB::ogdataEventSeconds

description: The unique name for the interface the alert occurred on.
variables.name: OG-DATA-MIB::ogdataEventDevice

description: The status of the data alert.
variables.name: OG-DATA-MIB::ogdataEventState
